name: Puss 'n' boats | The Game
description:
If you have arrived here is for a good reason... Try the NEW game from the Plank Gang Team!!!

Defend your treasure from the evil attacking cats.

Sink their ships with hilarious traps.

It's here... It's... 

PUSS 'n BOATS

Made in 7 days For the:

IndieDevDay Game Jam

____________________________________________

THE TRAPS Plank Gang Team

Xeila Nieto Fernández • Level Design, 3D modelling & Animations

https://www.artstation.com/aixana 

Diego José Alfonso Rodríguez • Level Design & 3D modelling

 https://diegojarblog.wordpress.com/ 

Peter  Andrews • Music Composer

 https://twitter.com/petegoast

Panekous • 2D Artist, Marketing & Website

 https://twitter.com/PlankGangDev

Laura Almón Manzano • Programming & VFX 

 https://lauraalmon.wordpress.com/

__________

All the content of this game (2D and 3D art, animations, music & SFX, programming, shaders & VFX) has been done entirely by ourselves with the exception of the text font and the skybox used, which are both free:

  • Bakso Sapi (free text font): https://www.dafont.com/bakso-sapi.font
  • Fantasy Skybox FREE: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...

__________

We have put our hearts into this, so we really hope you enjoy playing the game as much as we did developing it. Thanks to the organization of the Indie Dev Day Game Jam as well as to all the participants for making it real!
